title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) 

Regulations 2020.

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Quota Regulation” means Council Regulation
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Quota Regulation” means Council Regulation 

(EU) 2020/123 of 27 January 2020. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in the Quota Regulation and is also 
used in these Regulations, has, unless the context otherwise requires, the same 
meaning in these Regulations as it has in the Quota Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation quota regulation mean council regulation (eu) 2020 123 27 january 2020 (2) word expression used quota regulation also used regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation quota regulation

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 3. The master of -
text_raw:
3. The master of - 

(a) 

(b) 

an Irish sea-fishing boat wherever it may be, or 

a sea-fishing boat in the exclusive fishing limits of the State 

shall comply with Articles 5(2), 7, 9, 11, 13, 14, 15, 16, 22, 24, 27, 28, 30, 32, 
33, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38, 39(2), 40, 43, 44, 45, 50, 51 and 52 of the Quota 
Regulation.
text_norm: 3 master - (a) (b) irish sea-fishing boat wherever may sea-fishing boat exclusive fishing limit state shall comply article 5(2) 7 9 11 13 14 15 16 22 24 27 28 30 32 33 34 35 36 37 38 39(2) 40 43 44 45 50 51 52 quota regulation

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 4. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the master of -
text_raw:
4. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), the master of - 

(a) 

(b) 

an Irish sea-fishing boat wherever it may be, or 

a sea-fishing boat in the exclusive fishing limits of the State 

shall comply with Article 10(1), (2) and (3) of the Quota Regulation in relation 
to sea bass. 

1 OJ L 25, 30.1.2020, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [57] 3 

(2) The master of an Irish sea-fishing boat operating in ICES Sub-area 6 or 
ICES Sub-area 7 is subject to the Bass (Conservation of Stocks) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. No. 230 of 2006) in relation to sea bass. 

(3) A person engaged in recreational fisheries that is fishing for sea bass 

shall comply with Article 10(5) and (6) of the Quota Regulation.
text_norm: 4 (1) subject paragraph (2) master - (a) (b) irish sea-fishing boat wherever may sea-fishing boat exclusive fishing limit state shall comply article 10(1) (2) (3) quota regulation relation sea bass 1 oj l 25 30.1.2020 p.1 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd march 2020 57 3 (2) master irish sea-fishing boat operating ice sub-area 6 ice sub-area 7 subject bass (conservation stocks) regulation 2006 (s.i no 230 2006) relation sea bass (3) person engaged recreational fishery fishing sea bass shall comply article 10(5) (6) quota regulation

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 5. The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 71 of 2019) are
text_raw:
5. The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 71 of 2019) are 

revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 February, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [57]
text_norm: 5 sea-fisheries (quotas) regulation 2019 (s.i no 71 2019) revoked given official seal 26 february 2020 michael creed minister agriculture food marine 4 57

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by sections 3 and 14 of the SeaFisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations have the purpose of giving effect to the provisions of 
Council Regulation (EU) 2020/123 fixing for 2020 the fishing opportunities for 
certain fish stocks and groups of fish stocks, applicable in Union waters and, 
for Union fishing vessels, in certain non-Union waters 

 
 
 
 
 
 [57] 5
